Class FileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileHandler

  • public class FileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles loading persistent song data
    Author:
    Andrew Mohnkern

        Makes a song path persistent

      • loadPlaylist

        public java.util.ArrayList<Playable> loadPlaylist(java.lang.String fileName)
        Loads an existing playlist from a file location.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file location.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Song objects.

      • getLastPath

        public java.lang.String getLastPath()
        Gets the path of the last directory the user imported a song from.
        Returns:
        A String containing the last path a song was imported from.

      • setLastPath

        public void setLastPath(java.lang.String path)
        Sets the path of the last directory the user imported a song from.
        Parameters:
        path - The last directory visited.
